name: Hamayumi
description: A certain shrine maiden once owned this warbow. It was made with surpassing skill, and is both intricate and sturdy.

passiveDescription.0: Increases Normal Attack DMG by <cryo>16%</cryo> and Charged Attack DMG by <cryo>12%</cryo>. When the equipping character's Energy reaches 100%, this effect is increased by 100%.
passiveDescription.1: Increases Normal Attack DMG by <cryo>20%</cryo> and Charged Attack DMG by <cryo>15%</cryo>. When the equipping character's Energy reaches 100%, this effect is increased by 100%.
passiveDescription.2: Increases Normal Attack DMG by <cryo>24%</cryo> and Charged Attack DMG by <cryo>18%</cryo>. When the equipping character's Energy reaches 100%, this effect is increased by 100%.
passiveDescription.3: Increases Normal Attack DMG by <cryo>28%</cryo> and Charged Attack DMG by <cryo>21%</cryo>. When the equipping character's Energy reaches 100%, this effect is increased by 100%.
passiveDescription.4: Increases Normal Attack DMG by <cryo>32%</cryo> and Charged Attack DMG by <cryo>24%</cryo>. When the equipping character's Energy reaches 100%, this effect is increased by 100%.
